entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can we help you today?
Hi, I'm calling about a problem with my VeloFit Racer. I think something's wrong with it.
I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing issues with your VeloFit Racer. Can you describe the problem in more detail?
Well, first off, the pedal on the left side feels completely broken. Like, it's barely attached. And then I've noticed a really bad wheel wobble when I'm riding. It's getting pretty scary.
Okay, I understand. A broken pedal and wheel wobble are definitely concerning. Have you noticed anything else unusual, perhaps anything with the frame?
Actually, now that you mention it, I did see what looks like a small frame crack near the seat post. I wasn't sure if it was just a scratch at first.

A frame crack in combination with a broken pedal and wheel wobble is not good at all. It certainly sounds like you received a defective unit. Let's get this sorted out for you. Do you have your order number handy?

Thank you. Let me pull that up... Okay, I see your order here. Since your VeloFit Racer is still under warranty, we're going to offer you a full replacement. We'll ship out a brand new bike to you within 24 hours and provide a prepaid shipping label for the defective unit. Does that sound acceptable?
Wow, that's fantastic! Yes, that would be perfect.
Great! We'll also include a small gift as an apology for the inconvenience. Is the shipping address on file still current?
Yes, it is. Thank you so much! I was really worried, but you've made this so easy.

You're very welcome! We pride ourselves on taking care of our customers. We aim for every VeloFit Racer to be a joy to ride, and we're sorry that yours wasn't right from the start. You'll receive a tracking number for the new bike within 24 hours. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, that's everything. Thank you again so much for your help!
My pleasure! Have a great day, and happy riding once your new VeloFit Racer arrives!
